item.title: Country Holidays is introducing new Signature Departures for the year 2015
item.description:
Luxury travel agency Country Holidays has launched new “Signature Departures” trips for discerning travelers based in Singapore. Established in 2011, Signature Departures offers a fresh approach to group travel, steering clear of crowded buses, generic hotels, large-scale dining, and tourist traps. Theng Hwee Chang, Managing Director of Country Holidays, explains: “We created Signature Departures four years ago to address the increasing demand for more enriching group travel experiences that go beyond the ordinary...

item.title: OPPO empowers Singaporeans to discover the ultimate experience with #UncoverTheUltimate
item.description:
Last week, OPPO, a global provider of smart devices, introduced its latest lineup of smartphones, including the brand’s first 5G offering, the Find X2 Pro 5G, and a new addition to its creative Reno series, the Reno3. This unveiling follows the global online launch of the Find X2 series on March 6. The Find X2 Pro boasts a 120 Hz QHD AMOLED screen, 65 W SuperVOOC Flash Charge 2.0 technology, and the Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 processor, delivering an enhanced overall photography and video experience...

item.title: The Huawei nova 2i is a mid-range phone with four cameras
item.description:
Source: Huawei website. The nova 2i boasts a 5.9" FullView display. Huawei has released the nova 2i, a 4G LTE mid-range phone designed for users who love taking selfies. This device stands out with its four cameras - two in the front and two on the back. Clement Wong, Director of Global Product Marketing for the Huawei Consumer Business Group, highlighted that four cameras are uncommon in mid-range phones. He explained that Huawei aims to make its cutting-edge technology accessible to a wider customer base...

item.title: An easy solution for sprucing up your office walls
item.description:
Source: Photos.com website Getty Images, a stock image provider, has launched Photos.com, a new platform for purchasing stock images as wall art. This opens up a new avenue for sourcing images suitable for workplace decoration. Being backed by a stock image company, the site boasts an extensive collection of high-quality images. These images are available in color and monochrome, spanning a wide range of categories. The website states, “Each photograph on Photos...

item.title: The Pottinger Hong Kong is now open for business
item.description:
Sino Group, a hospitality branch of Sino Land Company, manages various properties including hotels, a yacht club, serviced apartments, and residential dining establishments. They have recently introduced The Pottinger Hong Kong, a luxurious 68-room boutique hotel. Situated on Hong Kong’s oldest paved street, the hotel holds a notable position on a site recognized as a Grade I historic place by the Antiquities Advisory Board of Hong Kong. As per the Sino Group of Hotels, The Pottinger Hong Kong features 68 upscale guestrooms and suites, with sizes varying from 23 to 68 square meters...

item.title: The Vivo V5s smartphone guarantees improved selfie quality
item.description:
Source: Vivo. NBA star Stephen Curry promotes the Vivo V5s, a phone designed for capturing flawless selfies. Vivo has unveiled its latest flagship phone, the V5s, furthering the company’s commitment to providing users with the ability to take “perfect selfies”. Alex Feng, Vivo’s Global VP, stated, “Our research indicates that selfies are a common part of our users’ daily lives. The V5s is a revolutionary smartphone designed to help users achieve flawless selfies, even in low light, and satisfy their desire for naturally enhanced portraits...

item.title: Huawei P9 and India Photo Project introduce Monochrome award in India
item.description:
Source: Instagram. Top Instagram posts for the contest hashtag #ipp_ma2016 at the time of writing. Huawei, in partnership with the Instagram-based India Photo Project, has introduced the “Monochrome” award to commemorate World Photography Day on August 19th. This competition, running from August 20th to August 31st, aims to discover India’s top black and white Instagram photographer. The judging panel comprises Sumit Dayal, recognized as CNN’s Indian Instagrammer of the Year in 2015, Tara Bedi, the first Instagram employee from India, Devika Daulet Singh, Director of PHOTOINK, a prominent photography gallery, and Neeraj Priyadarshini, the Photo Editor at the Indian Express...

item.title: The deadline for submissions to the Sony World Photography Awards 2019 is January 2019
item.description:
Global photographers have less than a month to submit their entries to the 12th annual Sony World Photography Awards’ Professional, Open and Youth competitions. Considered a major event in the photography world, the awards acknowledge the finest contemporary photography from the past year across a diverse range of photographic genres. Scott Gray, the CEO and founder of the World Photography Organisation, remarked that each year, the Sony World Photography Awards brings new photographic talents to light and provides established artists with a global stage for their work...

item.title: ImageCrowd has identified a market opportunity for an Asian stock photography marketplace
item.description:
ImageCrowd, a new multilingual platform, wants to make it easier to find Asian photography. They connect international buyers with Asian photographers in their native languages. Buyers can make specific image requests, and ImageCrowd will crowdsource photographers to find the perfect match. Both professional and amateur photographers can submit photos. Any photos not purchased are added to a stock photography database. “These days, visual campaigns need to be highly targeted,” says Gijs Waverijn, CEO of ImageCrowd...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/imagecrowd-has-identified-a-market-opportunity-for-an-asian-stock-photography-marketplace/

item.title: Follow the light from day to night on 28 July in Singapore
item.description:
Source: Canon. The Canon PhotoMarathon XVI will include assignments that extend from day into night. Returning for its 16th year, the Canon PhotoMarathon XVI is scheduled for July 28th in Singapore. This year, Canon is expanding the event by incorporating community support and introducing new competition elements. Building upon Canon’s ongoing support of local sports, Canon recently announced a partnership with Olympian Joseph Schooling. In line with the Canon PhotoMarathon’s goal to inspire and connect the photography community, Schooling will reveal one of the competition themes at the event...

item.description:
The Sony World Photography Awards is currently accepting entries for its 15th edition. Participation is free. Source: Sony World Photography Awards. item.title: Fujifilm has launched the X100T premium compact camera in the Middle East
item.description:
Fujifilm has introduced the X100T, a high-end compact camera succeeding the successful X100S, to the Middle East market. Source: Fujifilm. The X100T is available in black and silver. “The X100, launched in March 2011, established a new market for premium compact cameras. A year later, the second-generation X100S was released, featuring an updated sensor, processor, and an advanced Hybrid Viewfinder,” stated Yuta Kawamura, Marketing Manager for the electronic imaging division at Fujifilm Middle East & Africa...

item.title: The Canon PhotoMarathon is scheduled to take place in Singapore in November
item.description:
Source: Canon eDM. Now in its 12th year, the Canon PhotoMarathon 2014 is the biggest photography competition in the region. Taking place in Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam, India, Thailand, and Cambodia, the competition offers a fantastic chance for companies to form teams and compete in the Corporate Challenge category. Companies can participate by assembling a team of at least three individuals who register as a group. In contrast to the open and student divisions, corporate teams are evaluated collectively...

item.title: The HUAWEI P30 completely sold out on its first day in Singapore
item.description:
The Huawei P30 Series launched in Singapore at VivoCity yesterday and quickly sold out, with the first people in line having arrived the night before to buy the newest model in Huawei’s photography-focused smartphone line. The Huawei P30 Series has garnered attention since its global launch last week in France for its Leica Quad Camera, the first of its kind, which boasts cutting-edge zoom and low-light capabilities. Yvelyn Tey, the first person in line, waited with her fiance to purchase the phone...

item.title: The Avani is one of the most Instagrammable hotels in the world, located in the APME region
item.description:
Avani Hotels & Resorts has compiled a selection of its properties with the most striking photo opportunities, particularly within the Asia Pacific, Middle East, and Africa regions: Avani+ Samui Resort in Thailand The resort boasts a pristine white infinity pool and private villas, strategically placed to capture stunning sunset views. As an alternative backdrop, the scenic Phang Ka Bay provides a picturesque setting. item.title: HTC revolutionizes photography with the RE camera
item.description:
HTC is launching a new camera called the RE, aiming to change how people take pictures. This waterproof handheld device can capture time-lapse photos and even act as a remote viewfinder for smartphones. Source: HTC blog. HTC CEO Peter Chou emphasizes their dedication to innovation, stating that the RE camera will allow people to experience photography in a new way. The RE’s grip sensor activates upon pickup, removing the need for a power button...

item.title: The winners of Canon PhotoMarathon XVI 2018 have been revealed
item.description:
The winners of the 16th Canon PhotoMarathon XVI 2018 in Singapore have been revealed. This annual photography competition, being the largest in the region, challenges photography enthusiasts to test their skills under a time constraint. A new challenge category, ‘dusk,’ was introduced this year, allowing participants to capture a blend of daytime and nighttime scenes. Here is a list of the winners: Best Of Show - Student: Timothy John Low Wen, Nanyang Polytechnic Best Of Show - Open: Azril Azam Bin Abdul Rahim Team Category Winner: ORBIGUD School Challenge Winner: Anglo-Chinese School (Independent) Theme 1: Solitude Student Category 1st: Myo Thi Ha Kyaw, Nanyang Technological University 2nd: Evita Lee Ann Hwee, Christ Church Secondary School 3rd: Ong Yi Feng Jayden, Edgefield Secondary School Open Category 1st: Aht Yomyai 2nd: Zhang Dongli 3rd: Ahmad Iskandar Bin Abdullah Theme 2: Simplicity Student Category 1st: Jessie Chia, National University Of Singapore 2nd: Timothy John Low Wen, Nanyang Polytechnic 3rd: Teo Xu Kai, Temasek Polytechnic Open Category 1st: Ong Kah Hong 2nd: Azril Azam Bin Abdul Rahim 3rd: Siyuan Ma Canon Challenge Winner: Shrirang Rajaram Nirgun Theme 3: Glow Student Category 1st: Lester Thomas Daniel, Singapore Polytechnic 2nd: Mikaela Gn, Anglo-Chinese School (Independent) 3rd: Benjamin Tay Tze Min, Hwa Chong Institution Open Category 1st: Nursanto Soeradi Somo 2nd: Gerdie Hutomo 3rd: Mai Hung Son ..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-winners-of-canon-photomarathon-xvi-2018-have-been-revealed/

item.title: GMC uses Instagram to showcase PanoGrams and highlight #GMCprecision
item.description:
Source: GMC. GMC launched a new Instagram campaign using panoramic photography and the hashtag #GMCprecision. The month-long US campaign, which began on May 22nd, highlights the meticulous design of GMC vehicles. Using Instagram’s new Carousel format, GMC is one of the first car companies to create “PanoGrams." This format lets users swipe through a series of pictures in a single ad, similar to a multi-page spread in a magazine. These PanoGrams form one panoramic image and include a link to GMC’s website for further details...

item.title: New touchless camera app is now accessible
item.description:
Source: Crunchfish. Crunchfish, in partnership with MOMAX, has introduced MOMAX cam, a hands-free camera application for selfie sticks. MOMAX cam allows users to take pictures using gestures, touch, and Bluetooth. Here are some of its key features: Snap photos with a simple V-sign gesture. Use a touchless grab gesture to set the timer for capturing photos from up to 3 meters away. Switch between the front and rear cameras, as well as zoom in and out, using the Bluetooth trigger to get the perfect shot...

item.title: The Huawei P10 Plus has the potential to serve as a substitute for a digital SLR camera
item.description:
Fashion and beauty photographer Richard Chen, also a Leica Akademie Instructor, believes the Huawei P10 Plus offers the capabilities of a professional camera in a pocket-sized device. During a Huawei P10 Plus Masterclass held in Singapore, Chen, a professional Leica photographer, shared his growing preference for the Huawei P10 Plus’s mobile camera over traditional cameras for personal photography. He appreciates the portability and convenience of the smartphone, noting, “If I’m exploring I actually don’t bring the (conventional digital) camera nowadays… I’m starting to use it as the main camera...

item.title: At Shopee University: achieving that perfect Instagram shot
item.description:
To celebrate the launch of Shopee University, Shopee, the e-commerce branch of Garena, hosted a practical Shopee University session for the media. This session gave attendees a preview of the experience Shopee sellers and the public can expect. Each free session lasts around 60 to 90 minutes. Students must complete two basic and two advanced classes to qualify for expert classes. After that, they can attend unlimited expert sessions. The photography class showcased here is considered an advanced to expert level class...

item.title: AC Works introduces Korean versions of free stock image websites
item.description:
Source: AC works. Screen capture of illustAC. AC works, a company with over 2.3 million users in Japan, is expanding globally. They recently introduced Korean versions of their popular stock image platforms: photoAC, illustAC, and silhouetteAC. The stock image industry has historically been restrictive, often imposing fees for various uses of a single image. Costs are common for both the stock images themselves and their vector files. Purchased images typically come with limited usage rights, like a single use within a specific advertising campaign...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ac-works-introduces-korean-versions-of-free-stock-image-websites/

item.title: The winners of the 2017 Sony World Photography Awards in Singapore have been announced
item.description:
Lester Koh Meng Hua has been named the winner of the Singapore National Award, as part of the world’s largest photography competition. Source: Sony. Singapore at dawn won the Singapore National Award for the Sony World Photography Awards 2017. The photograph titled Singapore at dawn by Lester Koh Meng Hua has been chosen by the judges of the 2017 Sony World Photography Awards as the winner of the Singapore National Award...
